StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Blood Gene Signatures Associated with Stiffness After TKA

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: This data was generated with support by an Adult Reconstruction and Joint Replacement Marmor Research Award, Young Investigator Award, and Research and Education Fund grant from the Department of Anesthesiology, Critical Care, and Pain Management of the Hospital for Special Surgery, and a gift from Marina Kellen French and the Anna-Maria and Stephen Kellen French Foundation. The generation of this data was also supported by the National Center For Advancing Translational Science of the National Institute of Health Under Award Number UL1TR002384, the Tow Foundation, which provided support for the David Z. Rosensweig Genomics Research Center, Giammaria Giuliani, the Ira W. DeCamp Foundation, and the Ambrose Monell Foundation. The samples used to generate this data were provided by members of the TKAF Consortium at Hospital for Special Surgery. The full patient cohort is described in (PMID: 32269006) and the samples used to generate this data are described in (Kirksey et al, TBD )

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical
ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.
